# Crimes
## Sprit of The Law The laws are intended to be interpreted by their spirit and not always necessarily their exact wording. Always refer to the marine law rank structure if there is a disagreement on the interpretation of a law.
## Categories - [textlink="Variable" link="RMCMarineLawCrimesVariable"] - [textlink="Minor" link=""] - [textlink="Major" link=""] - [textlink="Capital" link=""] - [textlink="Optional" link=""] - [textlink="Precautionary" link=""]
